column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We arrived a little before 5 PM and were seated right away. I feel like the lasagna came out a little cool
column2: but for my son it was the perfect temperature. The salad came put promptly and the house red wine vinaigrette was really tasty. Â We ordered the Lou and should have looked closer at the ingredient list
column3: no sauce. It was still pretty good. There are benches for people who are waiting to be seated
column4: which they were when we left. The ladies restroom only has one stall.
